abstract: Carla Bruni, the wife of President Nicolas Sarkozy of France, gave birth to a girl on Wednesday evening while Mr. Sarkozy was returning from a meeting in Germany.
snippet: Carla Bruni, the wife of President Nicolas Sarkozy of France, gave birth to a girl on Wednesday evening while Mr. Sarkozy was returning from a meeting in Germany.

headline.main: It's a Girl for the French Presidential Couple
